hospital-negligence.title: Hospital Negligence
hospital-negligence.description: Nosocomial infections, falls, pressure ulcers, protocol failures.

obstetric-negligence.title: Obstetric Negligence
obstetric-negligence.description: Birth injuries: cerebral palsy, brachial plexus injuries, hypoxia.

medication-errors.title: Medication Errors
medication-errors.description: Incorrect doses, contraindicated medications, preventable adverse reactions.

informed-consent.title: Informed Consent
informed-consent.description: Lack of information about risks, unauthorized procedures.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: A clear and transparent process from first contact

step1.title: Free Initial Consultation
step1.description: We analyze your case without obligation. We explain your legal options and the viability of the claim.

step2.title: Expert Analysis
step2.description: We review all medical documentation with specialist experts who will determine if there was negligence.

step3.title: Out-of-Court Claim
step3.description: We try to resolve the case through direct negotiation with the insurer or healthcare center.

step4.title: Judicial Procedure
step4.description: If necessary, we take your case to trial with a specialized and experienced legal team.
